forum.content:
Hello, my name is Endo.
I'm a student and I'm looking for someone or more people who can volunteering​ themselves to help me in learning and practicing Taiwanese Mandarin. Instead, you can learning and practicing English with me. Therefore, it could be said that we can do exchange language study. Thank you so much, and hope we can be a friend in the mutuality in the future.
forum.title: Looking for someone or more people for learning and practicing Taiwanese Mandarin
